name: zombie battle strike
description:
Nobody thought it would come to this. What started with a few isolated cases has now become a fight for the survival of the human race. This is a Zombie Battle Strike.

Kill zombies on your way in city otherwise they have eat your brain.It blends the boundaries of classic shooting games and Dead Zombie shooting games.

Game Features

- Beautiful and realistic game graphics
- Smooth game control
- Realistic game music and sound effect
- Different Levels in Different Environments!
- Challenging missions.
